title: Nyamanton AKA Lessons from the Garbage (1987)
description:
Khalifa and Fanta, two children from a deprived suburb of Bamako, are expelled from school because they do not have the means to buy the necessary supplies. Here they are forced to collect garbage to try to finance their education. Exhausted by their work, children wear a look of mischievous replicas and humorous on the Malian changing society. 

Language: Bambara

Subtitle: French (hardcoded), English and Portuguese
